code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{db}from"../firebase";import{collection,getDocs,deleteDoc,doc}from"firebase/firestore";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeleteGist=()=>{const[gists,setGists]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchGists=async()=>{const snapshot=await getDocs(collection(db,"gists"));const gistsData=snapshot.docs.map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()}));setGists(gistsData);};fetchGists();},[]);const handleDeleteGist=async gistId=>{await deleteDoc(doc(db,"gists",gistId));setGists(gists.filter(gist=>gist.id!==gistId));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"delete-gist",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Delete a Gist"}),gists.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-plugins",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"No Gists to delete"})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gist-grid",children:gists.map(gist=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gist-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gist-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:gist.owner.avatar_url,alt:gist.owner.login,className:"w-10 h-10 rounded-full mr-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-bold",children:gist.owner.login}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:gist.description})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"buttons",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDeleteGist(gist.id),className:"delete",children:"Delete"})})]},gist.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),children:"Back"})]});};export default DeleteGist;
